scenario_text.value:
Agumon! Thank goodness I found you. Let’s—
Wait, huh?

Agumon? Agumon, what’s wrong?
Why are you turning all black?!
(No way... Agumon’s trying to attack me?!)

I can eat a human kid, no problem!
Are ya scared, Takuma?!

(This is weird... This isn’t the Agumon
I know. I believe in our bond!)

I won’t panic!
Besides, you’re not even Agumon!
Was that one of Arukenimon’s traps?

Man, what a dirty trick! I won’t let her have
her way, not a chance!
